name: An Empty Game
description:
Hello, welcome to An Empty Game. This is the first game that I have ever released. When making this game, I thought, “what kind of game would be the easiest to make.” And the answer was “a game with nothing.” In this game, you can talk to, but not respond to, the many characters I created, feel their pain, laugh at their jokes, and cringe at their appearance. Or do not do any of those things. The choice is yours when you play An Empty Game.

(plz play it)

How to play: WASD/Arrow keys to move, shift to move ever so slightly faster, E/Enter to interact.

Special thanks to the following people: Morgan Chipman for composing the short guitar riff at the beginning of the game;  All my playtesters: Ryan, Dylan, Mathew, Morgan, and Jake;

And you!

Notes: If, after beating the game, the game only shows a black screen, input the Konami code.

Despite what the game says, the game is 100% finished, except for minor patches.

This game contains disturbing elements. For more information visit this link: https://pastebin.com/raw/1mqtw3fd
